person.persName: James H. Hopper (Caldwell co. + Lyon Co, ky, laborer, sergeant in the 17th ky cav)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Caldwell County, Kentucky native. Son of Humphrey Hopper and Rebecca Hopper. Married to Mary E. Vanzant Hopper in Lyon County, Kentucky, on February 14, 1861. Father of Rebecca L. Hopper, Sarah E. Hopper, and Mary E. Hopper. Resident in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Lyon County in 1860. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a corporal and sergeant from December 5, 1864, to September 20, 1865.
